definition: Song Lian (1310-1381), Ming dynasty writer, historian and politician
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
name of a river in Hunan

sentences.english: For many reasons, it is difficult to sustain their friendship forever.
sentences.chinese: 由於種種原因，戴良與宋濂的友誼很難維持下去。

sentences.english: Song Lian's Poems, just like others' prose, are noted for vivid portrayal of characters.
sentences.chinese: 宋濂的詩歌如他的散文一樣，以善於刻畫人物見長。
